welcome_message_body: Welcome to Terrell, USA! Get ready to experience the charm of our city, known for its small-town feel and big-city amenities. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Terrell has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Terrell Field Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Terrell Field Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free wifi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Majors Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and charter flights at Majors Field Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
